items.title: Why OpenAI’s Advisory Board Is Calling for Continued Nonprofit Oversight
items.description: A recent report emphasizes just how ‘consequential’ the AI tech is that OpenAI has been developing.

items.title: Indeed and Glassdoor Just Laid Off 1,300 Employees, Citing AI
items.description: In a letter to the company, Indeed’s CEO talks clearly and directly about job cuts, delivering a great example for other leaders.

items.title: The House Just Passed a Historic Crypto Bill, Delivering a Huge Win to Stablecoin Fans
items.description: The GENIUS Act marks the first comprehensive legislation providing enforceable rules for stablecoins.

items.title: How to Be Productive During the Slow Summer Season and Prepare for the Fall Rush
items.description: Summer can provide ample opportunities for reflection, growth, and change.

items.title: Here’s Why You Should Pause Before Replying to That Email
items.description: Quick replies are often driven by an unconscious need to feel safe, seen, or in control.
